job_description:
- Develop, maintain, and improve the company’s internal tools to support operational requirements.
- Build backend applications using Java with the Spring Boot Framework.
- Design, manage, and optimize internal databases using PostgreSQL.
- Collaborate with internal teams to understand system needs and translate them into technical solutions.
- Perform debugging, troubleshooting, and ensure optimal performance and security of applications.
- Create and maintain technical documentation and ensure all implementations follow the company’s development standards.
